attributes.action: change his name to Turnip Turnover
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown is a very boring name. If he changes his name to Turnip Turnover, it will make him seem much more interesting and dynamic and more respected on the world stage.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
